title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1035.6 - Types of service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1035.6 - Types of service

State Regulations
(a) Except as
provided in subdivision (b) of this section, paratransit service shall be
provided on an origin-to-destination, advance reservation or subscription trip
basis, as applicable. (b) At the
authority's discretion, paratransit service may be provided by on-call service
or paratransit feeder service to an accessible fixed route where such service
enables the individual to use the fixed route system for his or her
trip. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1035.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
